## Folder Description

This folder contains the Unity folder and WebGL folder for project 1. 

## Game Link

<https://play.unity.com/mg/other/monkey-business-1-0>

## Game Description

Help Oswald the Orangutan collect his bananas! But watch out for the falling coconuts!

Use <- and -> to move left and right, and use the space bar to jump.
